languages.text: "Ты как-то упускаешь тот факт, что с суда друкари можно уйти только по частям после о-о-очень долгих пыток. Но какая разница, если есть возможность кинуть камнем в мон-кай, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты как-то упускаешь тот факт, что с суда друкари можно уйти только по частям после о-о-чень долгих пыток. Но какая разница, если есть возможность кинуть камнем в мон-кай, да?"

languages.text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"
languages.original_text: "Ты как-то упускаешь тот факт, что с суда друкари можно уйти только по частям после о-о-очень долгих пыток. Но какая разница, если есть возможность кинуть камнем в мон-кай, да?"

"I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

languages.text: 「デュカーリの裁きは、長い、長～い拷問の末にバラバラにならないと逃れられないってこと、忘れてない？まあ、『モン＝ケイ』をこき下ろせさえすれば、それで満足なんでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリの裁きは、長い、長～い拷問の末にバラバラにならないと逃れられないってこと、忘れてない？まあ、『モン＝ケイ』をこき下ろせさえすれば、それで満足なんでしょ？」

languages.text: "Ich vergesst wohl die Tatsache, dass man einen Drukhari-Prozess nur zerstückelt verlassen kann, nach langer, laaanger Folter. Aber wen kümmert's, solange Ihr über die 'Chem-Pan-Sey' wettern könnt, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich vergesst wohl die Tatsache, dass man einen Drukhari-Prozess nur zerstückelt verlassen kann, nach langer, laaanger Folter. Aber wen kümmert's, solange Ihr über die 'Chem-Pan-Sey' wettern könnt, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: « Je crois que vous oubliez une chose : on ne peut quitter un procès des Drukharis qu'en morceaux, après une trèèès longue torture. Mais bon, pourquoi s'embarrasser des détails quand on a l'occasion d'étriller les mon-keigh, pas vrai ? »
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que vous oubliez une chose : on ne peut quitter un procès des Drukharis qu'en morceaux, après une trèèès longue torture. Mais bon, pourquoi s'embarrasser des détails quand on a l'occasion d'étriller les mon-keigh, pas vrai ? »

languages.text: «Creo que olvidas el hecho de que un juicio Drukhari siempre termina con el acusado en trocitos después de una prolongadísima tortura. Pero qué más da, mientras puedas mofarte de los "mon-keigh", ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: «Creo que olvidas el hecho de que un juicio Drukhari siempre termina con el acusado en trocitos después de una prolongadísima tortura. Pero qué más da, mientras puedas mofarte de los "mon-keigh", ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “你好像忘了这件事情——那些被黑暗灵族审判的人，只会在无比漫长的折磨之后被活活撕成碎片。可这有什么的呢？你不过是想借这个机会谴责几句‘猴子’罢了，我没说错吧？”
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: “你好像忘了这件事情——那些被黑暗灵族审判的人，只会在无比漫长的折磨之后被活活撕成碎片。可这有什么的呢？你不过是想借这个机会谴责几句‘猴子’罢了，我没说错吧？”

languages.text: "Drukhari duruşmalarından ancak çok ama çok uzun süren işkencelerden sonra, parça pürçük hâlde kurtulabileceğini hatırlatırım. Tabii mon-keighlere çamur atmanın zevki başka, öyle değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari duruşmalarından ancak çok, çok uzun süren işkencelerden sonra, parça pürçük hâlde kurtulabileceğini hatırlatırım ama. Tabii mon-keighlere çamur atmanın zevki başka, değil mi?"

languages.original_text: "I think you're forgetting the fact that one can only leave a Drukhari trial in pieces, after some long, looong torture. But who cares, as long as you get to lambaste the 'mon-keigh,' am I right?"
